BR.name: Spider-Man™: Edge of Time
BR.description: Fight Today, Save Tomorrow. Play as both Amazing Spider-Man™ and Spider-Man 2099 in SPIDER-MAN™: EDGE OF TIME, a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled adventure that puts gamers on a mission to prevent a cataclysmic event that leads to an unexpected outcome: the death of Amazing Spider-Man. Rich, tightly crafted narrative written by acclaimed Marvel™ writer Peter David Epic mission to save Spider-Man and the world from a chaotic, dystopian future in a thrilling race against time Two timelines evolve in parallel with story-driven cause and effect moments where the actions of one Spider-Man have an immediate effect on the world of the other Spider-Man Unique combat abilities highlight Amazing's acrobatic agility and 2099's technological improvements All-new combat moves include Hyper-Sense and Accelerated Decoy

CA.name: Spider-Man™: Edge of Time
CA.description: Fight Today, Save Tomorrow. Play as both Amazing Spider-Man™ and Spider-Man 2099 in SPIDER-MAN™: EDGE OF TIME, a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled adventure that puts gamers on a mission to prevent a cataclysmic event that leads to an unexpected outcome: the death of Amazing Spider-Man. Rich, tightly crafted narrative written by acclaimed Marvel™ writer Peter David Epic mission to save Spider-Man and the world from a chaotic, dystopian future in a thrilling race against time Two timelines evolve in parallel with story-driven cause and effect moments where the actions of one Spider-Man have an immediate effect on the world of the other Spider-Man Unique combat abilities highlight Amazing's acrobatic agility and 2099's technological improvements All-new combat moves include Hyper-Sense and Accelerated Decoy

MX.name: Spider-Man™: Edge of Time
MX.description: Combate hoy, protege el mañana. Juega como Amazing Spiderman ™ y como Spider-Man 2099 en SPIDER-MAN ™: EDGE OF TIME, una aventura trepidante y cargada de energía que sitúa a los jugadores en una misión para prevenir un cataclismo que desencadenará una serie de eventos con un resultado fatídico: la muerte de Amazing Spider-Man. Con una historia elaborada escrita por el aclamado escritor de Marvel ™ Peter David. Embárcate en una misión épica para salvar a Spider-Man y el mundo de un futuro caótico y errático en una carrera contrarreloj. Dos líneas de tiempo evolucionarán en paralelo a través de la historia donde las acciones de un Spider-Man tendrán una consecuencia inmediata en la dimensión del otro Spider-Man. Habilidades de combate únicas que destacan la agilidad acrobática de Amazing Spider-Man y las mejoras tecnológicas de Spider-Man 2099.
